sentences.en: Accommodation Standard: Quasi - three - star hotel, hygiene and comfort are ensured.
sentences.cn: 住宿标准: 准三星, 确保卫生、舒适.

sentences.en: Be extra careful about personal hygiene.
Both hygiene and proper dilution are difficult to ensure.
sentences.cn: 奶粉的卫生和恰当稀释很难得到保证.

sentences.en: Good hygiene helps to minimize the risk of infection.
sentences.cn: 保持清洁有助于最大限度地减少感染的危险。

sentences.en: He's going to give us a lecture on public hygiene.
sentences.cn: 他要给我们作关于公共卫生方面的报告.

sentences.en: In the interests of hygiene, please wash your hands.
Infection with head lice is no reflection on personal hygiene.
sentences.cn: 头上生虱子并不说明不讲个人卫生。

sentences.en: People are now paying attention to cleanliness and personal hygiene.
sentences.cn: 现在人们注意清洁和个人卫生.

sentences.en: The Hygiene Bureau has confiscated the contents of some illegal crude workshops.
sentences.cn: 卫生局查抄了一批违法的土作坊.

sentences.en: The occurrence of the disease is apparently related to standards of hygiene.
sentences.cn: 这种病的发生率显然与卫生状况相关.

sentences.en: The principles of antisepsis were carried over into the public hygiene.
sentences.cn: 抗菌法的原则被应用于公共卫生.

sentences.en: Their course of study includes elementary hygiene and medical theory.
sentences.cn: 他们的课程包括基础卫生学和医疗知识.

sentences.en: Wash regularly to ensure personal hygiene.
sentences.cn: 要经常洗澡以保证个人卫生.

sentences.en: You must be scrupulous about hygiene when you're preparing a baby's feed.
sentences.cn: 给婴儿准备食物时，对卫生丝毫马虎不得。

words.tran_cn: 卫生的，保健的；卫生学的

trans.tran_en: the practice of keeping yourself and the things around you clean in order to prevent diseases
